synonyms.synonym: Silencing mediator of retinoic acid and thyroid hormone receptor

protein.specific_function: Mediates the transcriptional repression activity of some nuclear receptors by promoting chromatin condensation, thus preventing access of the basal transcription. Isoform 1 and isoform 5 have different affinities for different nuclear receptors

reference.reference_text: Sande S, Privalsky ML: Identification of TRACs (T3 receptor-associating cofactors), a family of cofactors that associate with, and modulate the activity of, nuclear hormone receptors. Mol Endocrinol. 1996 Jul;10(7):813-25.
